#summary Delphi IDE Colorizer (DIC) Features

= Introduction =

 The Delphi IDE Colorizer (DIC) is a RAD Studio Wizard which allows to customize the look and feel the *workspace* of the IDE, this plugin allows to change the appearance of the menus, docked windows, scrollbars and others controls. 

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/Delphi%20IDE%20Theme%20Editor/DIC/DIC%20Images/DeepskyBlue_default_layout_menu.png

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/Delphi%20IDE%20Theme%20Editor/DIC/DIC%20Images/YellowGreen_debug_layout_assembly.png

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/Delphi%20IDE%20Theme%20Editor/DIC/DIC%20Images/OrangeRed_default_layout_fmx.png

= Features =


 * DIC is compatible with RAD Studio XE, XE2, XE3, XE4, XE5, X6. 
 * Change the icons used in the title bar of the docked windows
 * Set the colors, and gradient direction of the title bar of the docked windows
 * Set the colors, and gradient direction of the toolbars.
 * Improve the drawing of the disabled icons used in menus and toolbars
 * Compatible with CnWizards and GExperts
 * Replace the icons used in the gutter and the debuger.
 * Includes 90 themes.
